TopicTitle: Does Kerbal Construction time work with 1.10.1

Articles.Content: I would like to have a modded career with kerbal construction time in 1.10.1, Unfortunately the game refuses to load whenever I have it installed. Is there a version of it that does work with 1.10.1 or an alternative mod that does? (Im on win10 if this helps). When I mean "not loading" I mean its getting hung up on verifying the breaking ground expansion and not proceeding into the games playable state. Or am I just an idiot who's installing it wrong.
Why don't you ask in the mod's thread?  You will get more views of people who actually know about the mod, including the mod author.
